name: Archangel (itch)
description: This is a game I made for a school project.  It was developed in about a month and a half and was designed to be as marketable as possible, for project criteria. It is highly unfinished and doesn't have an ending. Also there is a lot of bugs.  This game will never be finished or get patched. You can still play the game if you'd like and download the soundtrack, which features a lot of unused tracks I never had the time to implement. While being unfinished the game still has 3 different areas to explore, a town and a boss to fight.
